org.chronos.chronodb.internal.impl.jdbc.util

Class JdbcDataSourceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chronos.chronodb.internal.impl.jdbc.util.JdbcDataSourceUtil

  • public class JdbcDataSourceUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that allows for the creation of a wide range of DataSource instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      JdbcDataSourceUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javax.sql.DataSource getH2FileDataSource(java.lang.String filepath)
      Returns a DataSource that connects to a H2 Database that stores its files in the given directory.
      static javax.sql.DataSource getH2InMemoryDataSource(java.lang.String dbName)
      Returns a DataSource that connects to an in-memory H2 Database.

    • Method Detail

      • getH2InMemoryDataSource

        public static javax.sql.DataSource getH2InMemoryDataSource(java.lang.String dbName)
        Returns a DataSource that connects to an in-memory H2 Database.
        Parameters:
        dbName - The name of the database to connect to. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The DataSource. Never null.

      • getH2FileDataSource

        public static javax.sql.DataSource getH2FileDataSource(java.lang.String filepath)
        Returns a DataSource that connects to a H2 Database that stores its files in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The file path to use. Must point to a valid, existing directory. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The DataSource. Never null.
